#summary The navigator.platform property
#labels about-dom,is-dom-property

== Values ==

The `navigator.platform` property returns a string.
  * [BrowserFamilyFirefox Firefox] returns ...
  * [BrowserFamilyMSIE Internet Explorer] returns Win32 (on 32 & 64 bit machines)
  * [BrowserFamilySafari Safari] returns ...
  * [BrowserFamilyOpera Opera] returns ...

This property is read-only.
